original_text: Asaph was the chief, and second to him were Zechariah, Jeiel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Mattithiah, Eliab, Benaiah, Obed-edom, and Jeiel, who were to play harps and lyres; Asaph was to sound the cymbals,
korean_text: 아삽은 우두머리요 그 다음은 스가랴와 여이엘과 스미라못과 여히엘과 맛디디아와 엘리압과 브나야와 오벧에돔과 여이엘이라 비파와 수금을 타고 아삽은 제금을 힘있게 치고

sentences.original_text: and second to him were Zechariah, Jeiel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Mattithiah, Eliab, Benaiah, Obed-edom, and Jeiel
sentences.korean_translation: 그 다음은 스가랴, 여이엘, 스미라못, 여이엘, 맛디띠야, 엘리압, 브나야, 오벧에돔, 여이엘이었고

sentences.original_text: who were to play harps and lyres
Asaph was to sound the cymbals
